alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 16 at 2:29AM MDT until October 17 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER CONCERNS INCREASING FOR TUESDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON THROUGH 9PM TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136, AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 134, 135, 136, and 137. * WIND...West at 25 to 40 mph, gusting up to 60 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...None expected. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly to the east. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
